text: Citadelle is the French word for citadel (a castle, fortress, or fortified center). Citadelle may also refer to: *Citadelle, a book by Antoine de Saint- Exupéry *Citadelle of Quebec, a military installation in Quebec City, Canada *Citadelle Laferrière, (also known as Citadelle Henry Christophe or as the Citadelle), a large mountaintop fortress in Nord, Haiti ==See also== *Citadel (disambiguation) *Cittadella (disambiguation) *The Citadel (disambiguation)
title: Citadelle
